column1: title is the name of the approach and will appear in the title of the visuals, up to two approaches are possible
rating is an integer of 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 with 5 indicating highly acceptable performance, 3 neutral, and 1 unacceptable
confidence is one of four values, l = low, m = medium, h = high, vh = very high
pesticide_load is calculated by the user and can be entered if known

column6: 4.2 kg of bordeaux mixture applied per hectare, HPLI of 1.2 means a pesticide load of 5.04
5 kg of fairy dust applied per hectare, HPLI of 0.21,05 means a pesticide load of 1,05
